code: import React from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const DailyForecast=_ref=>{let{forecast}=_ref;if(!forecast)return null;const daily=forecast.list.filter((item,idx)=>idx%8===0).slice(0,5);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"mt-6 sm:mt-8",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"text-lg sm:text-2xl font-bold mb-4 text-heading animate-fadeIn",children:"5-Day Forecast"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"grid grid-cols-1 sm:grid-cols-2 lg:grid-cols-5 gap-4",children:daily.map((item,idx)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"p-3 sm:p-4 bg-card-bg backdrop-blur-lg rounded-lg text-center shadow-neumorphic animate-slideIn hover:border-2 hover:border-heading",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-primary text-xs sm:text-sm",children:new Date(item.dt*1000).toLocaleDateString()}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:`http://openweathermap.org/img/wn/${item.weather[0].icon}.png`,alt:"Weather Icon",className:"mx-auto w-10 sm:w-12"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"text-primary text-xs sm:text-sm",children:[Math.round(item.main.temp),"\xB0C"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"capitalize text-primary text-xs sm:text-sm",children:item.weather[0].description})]},idx))})]});};export default DailyForecast;
